alert.note: Alert for Cass; Fulton; Mason; Menard; Schuyler (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 5:19PM CDT until March 31 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Menard County in central Illinois... Southern Fulton County in west central Illinois... Northeastern Cass County in west central Illinois... East central Schuyler County in west central Illinois... Mason County in central Illinois... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 518 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bath, or 13 miles southwest of Havana, moving northeast at 80 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Kilbourne around 525 PM CDT. Havana around 530 PM CDT. Easton around 535 PM CDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and west central Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and west central Illinois.
